name: Intelligent Data Pipeline with Agent Automation
description: AI-powered ETL pipeline using Agno agent teams for intelligent data processing, adaptive workflows, and automated decision making

steps.name: Smart Pipeline
steps.prompt: Create an Agno-Powered Smart Pipeline: IntelligentDataPipeline using Agno agent teams for adaptive ETL operations, smart data quality management, and automated workflow optimization

objective.task: Create an intelligent data processing pipeline called 'IntelligentDataPipeline' using Agno agent teams for adaptive ETL operations, smart data quality management, and automated workflow optimization
constraints: Use Agno framework for all intelligent pipeline operations
Implement multi-agent system for different data processing stages
Use RAG for knowledge-enhanced data processing decisions
Implement agent memory for learning data patterns and optimizations
Support adaptive pipeline configuration based on data characteristics
Include intelligent error handling and recovery with agent coordination
Use machine learning for data quality assessment and improvement
Implement predictive analytics for pipeline performance optimization

file_structure.pipeline.py: Main pipeline orchestrator with Agno agent coordination
file_structure.agents/: Agno agent definitions for intelligent data processing
file_structure.extractors/: Data extraction modules with AI enhancement
file_structure.transformers/: Intelligent data transformation with agent logic
file_structure.loaders/: Smart data loading with quality validation
file_structure.intelligence/: AI processing engines and learning systems
file_structure.knowledge/: Data pattern knowledge base and processing insights
file_structure.schemas/: Data schemas with AI validation rules
